data.label: ion
data.description: ion 是 Google 在 Android 4.0 ICS 为了解决内存碎片化管理而引入的通用内存管理器，用来支持不同的内存分配机制。另外，ion 在内核空间和用户空间分别有一套接口，它不仅能管理内存，还可在其 clients（来自内核的或者来自用户空间的）之间共享内存；简单来说，ion 是一种用于内存管理和分配的高性能内核驱动程序。它可以帮助开发人员实现零拷贝（zero-copy）和共享内存等功能，从而提高系统的性能和效率。与此同时，ion 还与 CMA（Contiguous Memory Allocator）密切相关。在 Android 中，ion 使用了 CMA 来实现对物理内存的分配和释放。

data.label: ion
data.description: ion is a general memory manager introduced by Google in Android 4.0 ICS to solve memory fragmentation management, supporting different memory allocation mechanisms. Additionally, ion has a set of interfaces in both kernel space and user space, managing memory and sharing it between its clients (from the kernel or user space). Simply put, ion is a high-performance kernel driver for memory management and allocation. It helps developers achieve zero-copy and shared memory functions, improving system performance and efficiency. Meanwhile, ion is closely related to CMA (Contiguous Memory Allocator). In Android, ion uses CMA for physical memory allocation and release.
